meanings.definition: The state or quality of being scratchy.
meanings.sent1: The scratchinesses of the rough fabric irritated my skin.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the scratchinesses of the sandpaper against my fingertips.
meanings.sent3: The cat's scratchinesses made it a challenge to cuddle with her.
meanings.sent4: The scratchinesses of his voice reminded me of a gravel road.
meanings.sent5: The scratchinesses of the wool sweater made me itch uncontrollably.
